channel.title: Bingo Book
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bingo Book" - Retaliation FTW!

item.title: Re: Bingo Book
item.content:encoded:
They look cool xD

Nah, they have no other use :P

item.title: Re: Bingo Book
item.content:encoded: Question: What are style points good for, beyond the 200 to get Hyuk?

item.title: Re: Bingo Book
item.content:encoded:
Nice ^^ people just can post like: Bingo'ed by; Venatus of Rasta Village (in case of…. forgot name)

Then the one who took revenge can say: @name of requester Confirmed, he stroke to his heart when I wrote his name ^^

Ps: Sticky ? :rolleyes:

item.title: Re: Bingo Book
item.content:encoded:
Sounds like a good idea to me… as long as people make sure to make note of when they bingo someone. (As in, post in the thread saying, "<player x> bingo'd.")

I don't really want to bingo someone for revenge only to find that he/she is already bingo'd. Not only is a waste of stamina, but I need the style points as well.

item.title: Re: Bingo Book
item.content:encoded: Sure, I can set up a Wiki Bingo Book forum if you want a forum to post hit requests.

item.title: Bingo Book
item.content:encoded:
Okay ^^ so I got this idea just now.
Please let me explain; If you are bingo'd, you are stuck for 35 hours, with the feeling of revenge.
Now, no worries, post the victim on the forum, with village and he shall pay for his crimes against us!

So, basically, just post those who bingo'd you and someone will 'eliminate' and confirm the bingo ^^

And… as a bonus you may give a cause of death (lol xD Death Note stylish)

Please tell me what you think :)

Arkantos
(stacking up Note Page's :)
